text: Glad to have more variety at this area. Affordable and reliable pastas and pizzas of Korean flavorings. Fries were unfortunately cold. Fried chicken was okay. Overall food quality is above average but not great. A reliable fast food to visit once in a while.
Came down and ordered the pepperoni pizza to try and the portion size was perfect. The staff there was friendly and helpful. Would definitely go out of my way to come back.
I was suprised by how good the pizza was. The dough was crispy yet soft on the inside. Will come again soon as i want to try the pasta.
A great cozy place to chill. Super friendly staff. The ingredients on top of pizza is generous and the dough is crispy on the outside and soft inside. Very nice. Will definitely come often!!!

Convenient food. Like all frozen and they just heat up.
